com.github.davidmoten.rx.subjects

Class SingleSubscribeSubject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.Observable<T>
      • com.github.davidmoten.rx.subjects.SingleSubscribeSubject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of items being emitted/observed by this subject
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    rx.Observer<T>

    public final class SingleSubscribeSubject<T>
extends rx.Observable<T>
implements rx.Observer<T>
    A Subject that supports a maximum of one Subscriber. When there is no subscriber any notifications (onNext, onError, onCompleted) are ignored.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class rx.Observable

        rx.Observable.OnSubscribe<T>, rx.Observable.Operator<R,T>, rx.Observable.Transformer<T,R>
